Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/95th
ShortDescription: Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 86th pl, due to street blockage near Halsted/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 86th pl, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/95th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Jackson due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Jackson due to police activity..

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity.

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Red Line service to Howard

For service toward Howard, after stopping at Cermak-Chinatown, trains will then be diverted to the above-listed elevated stations, in the opposite order, through Armitage and then make all normal stops from Fullerton to Howard.

For service in areas away from where the Red Line is running

Consider using local bus alternatives through the area where you're traveling, including those to other train lines or where Red Line service has been rerouted to operate.
